channel.title: medium.com on c13u's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in medium.com on c13u's Blog

item.title: Project Dragonfly by Google
item.description: Project Dragonfly A censored version of Google search that blacklists websites and search terms about human rights, democracy, religion and peaceful protests. China has 750m people; 80% of its internet access is on Android. There’s $$$ to be made. Between 2006 and 2010, Google had maintained a censored Google Search, but was heavily criticized. Google Search was then uncensored because of “Chinese government efforts to limit free speech, block websites and hack Google computer systems”

item.title: So You Want to Reform Democracy [Medium]
item.description: So You Want to Reform Democracy. Joshua Tauberer. https://medium.com/civic-tech-thoughts-from-joshdata/so-you-want-to-reform-democracy-7f3b1ef10597 . Nov 22, 2015. If there was an idea that could ‘fix’ democracy, it would have been thought-up already. If you don’t see your idea out there, it’s because it didn’t work the hundreds of other times someone tried it. Let’s tell representatives what their constituents think. Then they HAVE to vote with us! They don’t necessarily want to know what their constituents are thinking.
